articles.title: Tata Altroz CNG : Our observations after a day of driving - Team-BHP
articles.description: Driving the Tata Altroz 1.2L CNG: The Altroz CNG is powered by a 1.2-litre, 3-cylinder Revotron petrol engine that makes 73 BHP @ 6,000 rpm and 103 Nm @ 3,300 rpm in CNG mode. That’s 14 BHP and 12 Nm lower than in petrol mode:
articles.content:
Theres enough pep on tap for city driving and you can easily keep up with the traffic and close gaps to the cars in front.
